name: The Fabulous Adventure of Lemon And Steve
name_original: The Fabulous Adventure of Lemon And Steve
description:
Winner of "MOST INVENTIVE GAME" at the 2019 UoC Game jam. Judged by industry professionals Meg Rouncefield (TT Games) and Matt Phillips (Big Evil Corporation).

A multiplayer puzzle game with a twist. can you work together?

Play as Lemon and Steve to test your ability to work together to complete puzzles to get to a prize at the end. you may come across some obstacles along the way that will test your friendship so be cautious!

Game Created by 

Dot Went
Archie Grant
Kira Kilgour
Jamie Bates
Adam Hartley
